snippet: Our chief national correspondent discusses what he learned from being “on the other side” of a reporter’s notebook and whether he felt guilty about his involvement in the firing of Kurt Bardella, former press secretary to Representative Darrell...
abstract: Our chief national correspondent discusses what he learned from being “on the other side” of a reporter’s notebook and whether he felt guilty about his involvement in the firing of Kurt Bardella, former press secretary to Representative Darrell Issa.

headline.main: Behind the Cover Story: Mark Leibovich on Being Part of a Washington 'Scandal'
